name: LODE

summary: LODE is a monetary system backed by silver and gold. It creates inflation resistant and transparent financial solutions. Spend, send, save, and earn money securely. Itâ€™s existing products are AGX Coins (digital silver), AUX Coins (digital gold), LODE Tokens, and the Web3 LODEapp Wallet.
